thread.title: Iran expands solar power generation capacity nationwide
thread.title_full: Iran expands solar power generation capacity nationwide

author: Sign
title: Iran expands solar power generation capacity nationwide
text:
Iran expands solar power generation capacity nationwide
Iran has significantly increased the electricity generation capacity of its solar power plants, raising it from around 1,200 megawatts to nearly 2,700 megawatts under the current government.
